class mural.color.RgbValue(r, g, b)¶

Bases: object

complement()¶
contrast_ratio(other, precision)¶
classmethod from_hex(hex_str: str)¶
property relative_luminance¶

Calculates the relative luminance of this RgbValue.

This method calculates relative luminance by first normalizing the rgb values, then applying the following formula:

Y = 0.2126R + 0.7152G + 0.0722B

Returns:

double – returns a double precision value denoting relative luminance.

Mural¶

property relative_luminance¶

Calculates the relative luminance of this RgbValue.

This method calculates relative luminance by first normalizing the rgb values, then applying the following formula:

Y = 0.2126R + 0.7152G + 0.0722B

Returns:

double – returns a double precision value denoting relative luminance.
